product_name: BiodermaSensibio H2O Micellar Water Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganBioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin is the first micellar water ever created, an all-in-one makeup remover with unique technology.
details: DetailsBenefits#1st micellar water created, original formula!Gently and deeply cleanses the skin.All-in-one makeup removing and cleansing water that effortlessly removes makeup and dirt.Effectively removes 99% of makeup from face and eyes (vivo study on 10 volunteers aged 25 to 49).Instantly soothes the skin, reducing discomfort.Ideal for sensitive skin, including those exposed to pollutants, stress, and makeup.No-rinse formula.Key IngredientsFormulated with D.A.F. Complex and Micellar Technology to increase the skin's tolerance threshold, capture impurities, and soothe sensitive skin while maintaining its natural balance.Formulated WithoutFragranceItem 2636044How To UseUse as a daily cleanser and makeup remover to gently cleanse and soothe the skin. Apply morning and/or evening by soaking a cotton pad with Sensibio H2O. Gently cleanse and remove makeup from your face and eyes. No rinsing required.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Fructooligosaccharides, Mannitol, Xylitol, Rhamnose, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Bromide, Disodium Edta.
how_to_use: Use as a daily cleanser and makeup remover to gently cleanse and soothe the skin. Apply morning and/or evening by soaking a cotton pad with Sensibio H2O. Gently cleanse and remove makeup from your face and eyes. No rinsing required.

reviews.headline: Exceptional product
reviews.comments: My skin felt clean and refreshed without having any dryness. It removed my makeup with ease and left no oily residue. Will be purchasing!

reviews.headline: Favorite cleanser
reviews.comments:
I've used this micellar water for years and have never found another as good. It removes makeup effortlessly, isn't stripping or irritating to my skin, and works great for lazy days when I really don't want to do a full  face wash at the sink. Bonus - it also removes  dye stains from my skin when I use semi permanent color!

It's a great value also, I use a cotton pad to wipe this over my skin and really don't need much to clean my face so a big bottle lasts me quite a while with daily use.

reviews.headline: Only wish sample was larger
reviews.comments:
Loved the sample but needed to be larger. 
Was only enough for 1 1/2 application 
But cleaned my skin and left very smooth.  
I will be buying this asap

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: This product was introduced to me by an aesthetician.  It is the first step at night in taking off my makeup with a pad & then I wash my face with a different cleanser that she recommended.

reviews.headline: Better than water
reviews.comments: I like to put this on my magic makeup remover round instead of water and it works like a charm. Removed all mascara gently and face impurities as well. I find myself refreshing my neck and chest as well.

reviews.headline: I would get it I like it
reviews.comments: Very nice and gentle on the skin

reviews.headline: Doesn't work!
reviews.comments: This stuff doesn't actually remove the make up, it just smears it around. Worthless!

reviews.headline: I love this product removed all eye makeup effortlessly
reviews.comments: I was totally surprised with this product to remove all eye makeup and mascara effortlessly . I will continue to buy this and has become my favorite.

reviews.headline: Bioderma Sensibio H2O
reviews.comments: Doesn't have an unpleasant smell. Does a good job of removing makeup. Good package size, lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Clean and hydrated
reviews.comments:
Gentle not irritating. Skin feels clean yet not dry.
Easy to use.

reviews.headline: One of the best makeup removers I've used
reviews.comments: I loved the way this removed my waterproof makeup. Super easy and did not irritate or make my eyes red. Also no greasy/oily feeling after. I would recommend to anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Essential
reviews.comments: I love using micellar water to clean my face after cleansing. This Bioderma one is great. It cleaned my skin without drying it out. It helped wipe away any makeup that was still left behind after washing my face. This was great for my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: I will repurchase again for sure
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin, and it doesn't irritate my skin when I remove my makeup! It does irritate my eye a tiny bit but not super strong like other ones. Did amazing job on makeup removal too. Overall I would repurchase again during promotion.

reviews.headline: Recommend this cleanser!
reviews.comments: I love the Bioderma Micellar Water Cleanser. I love to use it on a daily just to clean my face.I love how it is made for people with skin sensitivities, which in turns keep my skin calm, clean, and refreshed.

reviews.headline: Its gentle and soft for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Its a good quality Micellar water. Also its safe for sensitive skin and doesn't leave the skin too dry.

reviews.headline: Gentle on your skin
reviews.comments: I love how effective this was to remove any dirt and makeup and be safe for my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Great for Sentive skin
reviews.comments: Highly recommend for sensitive skin. Other brands would irritate my skin, but this was gentle enough. Use it for makeup removal or at the end of the day to clean up my face. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Easy Makeup Removal
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed using the Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin as it is so easy and quick to remove my makeup without being rough and over stripping my skin. I just use a reusable cloth or cotton buds, pour some micellar water into it, and I start gently wiping my face all over. Easy removal and if you like, you do not need to wash your face again with water but I prefer to do that. Other than that, best micellar water ever.

reviews.headline: Perfect for eye makeup removal
reviews.comments: I used this on my mascara, eyeliner, and eyeshadow. It worked like a charm and didn't feel like it left any oily residue. No fragrance was also a plus!

reviews.headline: Moisturizing micellers
reviews.comments: Sadly my sample was damaged in transit but I was still able to squeeze a few delightful drops for the package. I went in raw(hands) and rubbed it on my face neck and under eyes after a long day of environmental factors. Love the moisture effect and glow

media.headline: I didn't think my skin could get any cleaner!

faceoff_positive.comments: I suffer from Utricartrial Vasculitis which is an autoimmune illnesses where my body attacks my blood vessels and manifests in the form of rashes, pock marks,  redness, occasional itch and pain. This means my skin is sensitive, reaction/blemish prone and needs several-step skin care and products. But I HAVE to selective with what I use. I never tried micellar water because I use cleanser, makeup wipes and ph-balancing toner so I didn't feel I need this. Well, consider me swayed. Bioderma is gentle, did not cause my fave to inflame in anyway and cleaned remaining dirt and residue that remained even after cleansing and using a makeup wipe. I would certainly add Bioderma to my routine. Gentle and works!
faceoff_positive.headline: Works even with an autoimmune illness!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was excited to try the Bioderma Micellar Water, but unfortunately, it arrived busted and leaking in the mail. The product itself seems promising, but the packaging really needs improvement. Disappointed with how it was shipped.
faceoff_negative.headline: It came in busted in the mail.

rollup.name: Sensibio H2O Micellar Water Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin
